# Nandi Award for Best Popular Feature Film

The Nandi Award for First Best Popular Feature Film winners was institute since 2005:
{| cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" width="50%"
|- bgcolor="#d1e4fd"
! Year || Film || Producer
|-
| 2016 || Janatha Garage || Y. Naveen, Y. Ravi Shankar, C. V. Mohan
|- bgcolor=#edf3fe

|-
| 2014 || Loukyam || V. Anand Prasad
|- bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2013 || Attarintiki Daredi || B. V. S. N. Prasad

|- bgcolor=#edf3fe
